title: Letter from Vice President Biden on Oversight of the American Recovery and Reinvestment Act | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




April 23, 2009

 



Letter from Vice President Biden on Oversight of the American Recovery and Reinvestment Act




THE WHITE HOUSE   Office of the Vice President  __________________________________________________________________________  FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE                                                    April 23, 2009 Vice President Biden today sent the following letter to the Chairman of the Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs Chairman Joseph Lieberman and Ranking Member Susan Collins, detailing current and upcoming Recovery Act oversight efforts and expressing his desire to continue to work with them to ensure that Recovery Act spending meets the highest standards for accountability and oversight.  Read the letter (pdf)
